boardgame.name: Hold the Line
boardgame.description: Take command of the American and British Armies in twelve great battles of the American Revolutionary War. You'll feel the battles come to life as the American Continentals and feared British Elites try to hold the line against each other at the battles of Long Island, Harlem Heights, Weitzel's Mill,Trenton, Hobkirk's Hill, Eutaw Springs, Bemis Heights, White Plains, Kings Mountain, Brandywine, and the double scenario covering the morning and afternoon battles at Monmouth._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game comes with a beautiful hard mounted game board with hard mounted terrain tiles, counters and thick counters representing infantry, dragoons and artillery. The game also uses the Clash for a Continent system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As British leaders you've told the American patriots to lay down their weapons or you'll lay waste to their homes. And as the Americans you have pledged your lives and fortunes in defense of all you value. Take the role of British generals Howe, Burgoyne, Cornwallis and others as you stake your reputation on defeating the rebel armies. As American generals Washington, Greene, Gates and others as you've precariously placed your army in their path... The enemy approaches, the sound of cannon deafens, men shout commands, smoke fills the air, can you HOLD THE LINE!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scenarios:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Long Island_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Harlem Heights_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;White Plains_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Trenton_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Brandywine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Bemis Heights_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Monmouth (morning phase)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Monmouth (afternoon phase)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kings Mountain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Weitzel's Mill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hobkirk's Hill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Eutaw Springs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Princeton_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Worthington Games (WOG 008) Take command of the American and British Armies in twelve great battles of the American Revolutionary War. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll feel the battles come to life as the American Continentals and feared British Elites try to hold the line against each other at the battles of Long Island, Harlem Heights, Princeton, Trenton, Hobkirk_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hill, Eutaw Springs, Bemis Heights, White Plains, Kings Mountain, Brandywine, and the double scenario covering the morning and afternoon battles at Monmouth. The game comes with a beautiful hard mounted game board with hard mounted terrain tiles, large counters. The game also uses the Clash for a Continent system. As British leaders you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve told the American patriots to lay down their weapons or you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll lay waste to their lands. And as the Americans you have pledged your lives and fortunes in defense of all you value. Take the role of British generals Howe, Burgoyne, Cornwallis and others as you stake your reputation on defeating the rebel armies. As American generals Washington, Greene, Gates and others as you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve precariously placed your army in their path... The enemy approaches, the sound of cannon deafens, men shout commands, smoke fills the air, can you HOLD THE LINE!

This is for Hold the Line PLUS the French Indian War Expansion to Hold the Line. The base game is opened and unpunched. The expansion is still sealed, brand new. I just don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know when I am going to get a chance to play this. Now you can have both! Shipping is for USPS Flat Rate with delivery confirmation. I do not charge extra for PayPal.
